title: How to Evolve Porygon

steps.headline: Obtain an Up-Grade.
steps.description:
You will need to give this item to Porygon to hold. When Porygon is traded while holding an Up-Grade, it will evolve into Porygon2. You can get an Up-Grade in Gen 2 (Gold, Silver, Crystal) and later. Game Version
Up-Grade Location

Gold/Silver/Crystal


 Silph Co.


FireRed/LeafGreen


 Rocket Warehouse, Trainer Tower prize


 Diamond/Pearl/Platinum 


 Eterna City*, Route 224**, Galactic Eterna Building**


HeartGold/SoulSilver


 Silph Co.


Black/White


 Route 13, Route 15


Black2/White2


  Pinwheel Forest, Join Avenue (Antique Shop), Striaton City, Black City*** 


X/Y


 Battle Maison


Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire


 Battle Resort


Sun/Moon


 Aether House****, Battle Tree


*Given by Professor Oak after completing the National Pokedex
**Platinum only
***Black 2 only
****Given by Aether Foundation employee after completing the Ultra Beast quest

steps.headline: Equip Porygon with the Up-Grade item.
steps.description: Open your Pokémon menu and give Porygon the Up-Grade item. Since you can usually only get one Up-Grade per game, make sure you equip it to the Porygon that you want to evolve the most.

steps.headline: Trade Porygon.
steps.description: Find a friend or trade Porygon to yourself if you have two games. When the trade occurs, Porygon will evolve into Porygon2. You can then trade Porygon2 back to your game to use it.

steps.headline: Obtain a Dubious Disc.
steps.description:
You will need to give this item to Porygon2 to hold. When Porygon2 is traded while holding a Dubious Disc, it will evolve into Porygon-Z. You can get a Dubious Disc in Gen 4 (Diamond, Pearl, and Platinum) and later. Game Version
Dubious Disc Location

 Diamond/Pearl/Platinum 


 Route 225, Team Galactic HQ*


HeartGold/SoulSilver


 Route 42


Black/White


 Route 13, P2 Laboratory


Black2/White2


  Join Avenue (Antique Shop), P2 Laboratory, Black City** 


X/Y


 Battle Maison


Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire


 Battle Resort


Sun/Moon


 Aether Paradise***, Battle Tree


*Platinum only
**Black 2 only
***Given by Faba after completing the Ultra Beast quest and defeating him in battle

steps.headline: Equip Porygon2 with the Dubious Disc item.
steps.description: Open your Pokémon menu and give Porygon2 the Dubious Disc item. Since you can usually only get one Dubious Disc per game, make sure you equip it to the Porygon2 that you want to evolve the most.

steps.headline: Trade Porygon2.
steps.description: Find a friend or trade Porygon2 to yourself if you have two games. When the trade occurs, Porygon2 will evolve into Porygon-Z. You can then trade Porygon-Z back to your game to use it.

text:
Evolving Porygon into Porygon2 Obtain an Up-Grade. You will need to give this item to Porygon to hold. When Porygon is traded while holding an Up-Grade, it will evolve into Porygon2. You can get an Up-Grade in Gen 2 (Gold, Silver, Crystal) and later. Game Version

*Given by Professor Oak after completing the National Pokedex

****Given by Aether Foundation employee after completing the Ultra Beast quest Equip Porygon with the Up-Grade item. Open your Pokémon menu and give Porygon the Up-Grade item. Since you can usually only get one Up-Grade per game, make sure you equip it to the Porygon that you want to evolve the most. Trade Porygon. Find a friend or trade Porygon to yourself if you have two games. When the trade occurs, Porygon will evolve into Porygon2. You can then trade Porygon2 back to your game to use it. Evolving Porygon2 into Porygon-Z Obtain a Dubious Disc. You will need to give this item to Porygon2 to hold. When Porygon2 is traded while holding a Dubious Disc, it will evolve into Porygon-Z. You can get a Dubious Disc in Gen 4 (Diamond, Pearl, and Platinum) and later. Game Version

***Given by Faba after completing the Ultra Beast quest and defeating him in battle Equip Porygon2 with the Dubious Disc item. Open your Pokémon menu and give Porygon2 the Dubious Disc item. Since you can usually only get one Dubious Disc per game, make sure you equip it to the Porygon2 that you want to evolve the most. Trade Porygon2. Find a friend or trade Porygon2 to yourself if you have two games. When the trade occurs, Porygon2 will evolve into Porygon-Z. You can then trade Porygon-Z back to your game to use it.
